unusedAsInfo.title: Show unused values with severity info
unusedAsInfo.description: Show unused values with severity 'info' instead of 'error'

autocompletionSuggestionPriority.description: Snippets etc have priority of 1. Requires Atom restart

locale.title: TypeScript locale
locale.description: Use this locale for TypeScript messages (e.g. 'de'). Requires Atom restart

preferBuiltinTooltips.title: Prefer built-in type tooltips
preferBuiltinTooltips.description: Use built-in tooltips for displaying type information instead of Atom-IDE ones (if available); Change requires Atom restart

preferBuiltinSigHelp.title: Prefer built-in signature help tooltips
preferBuiltinSigHelp.description: Use built-in tooltips for displaying signature help instead of Atom-IDE ones (if available); Change requires Atom restart

preferBuiltinBusySignal.title: Prefer built-in busy status indicator
preferBuiltinBusySignal.description: Use built-in busy status indicator instead of Atom-IDE one (if available); Change requires Atom restart

preferBuiltinOccurrenceHighlight.title: Prefer built-in occurrence highligting
preferBuiltinOccurrenceHighlight.description: Use built-in occurrence highlights instead of Atom-IDE one (if available); Change requires Atom restart

disableAtomIdeDefinitions.title: Disable Atom-IDE Definitions interface
disableAtomIdeDefinitions.description: Atom-IDE will revert to using Hyperclick for go-to-definition; Atom-Typescript will be able to track position history and return-from-declaration command will work; you will lose fancy previews on ctrl/cmd+mouseover though; Change requires Atom restart

buildStatusTimeout.title: Build status visibility timeout
buildStatusTimeout.description: How long to show successful build status, in seconds. Failed status will be shown indefinitely. Negative means forever

showSemanticView.title: Show semantic view
showSemanticView.description: Show semantic view (outline) for typescript content

tooltipDelay.title: Type tooltip delay
tooltipDelay.description: Delay before type tooltip is shown on mouse hover in milliseconds

ignoredDiagnosticCodes.title: Ignore diagnostics
ignoredDiagnosticCodes.description: List of diagnostic codes to ignore, comma-separated. Refer to [diagnosticMessages.json](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/blob/master/src/compiler/diagnosticMessages.json) for diagnostic codes

ignoreUnusedSuggestionDiagnostics.title: Ignore 'unused parameter/variable/etc' suggestion diagnostics
ignoreUnusedSuggestionDiagnostics.description: When `noUnusedLocals` etc are disabled, TypeScript 2.9 and above still report this as 'suggestions'. This option will filter these out

suppressAllDiagnostics.title: Suppress all diagnostics
suppressAllDiagnostics.description: The package will not report any problems with TypeScript. Use only if you know what you are doing

tsFileExtensions.title: TypeScript file extensions
tsFileExtensions.description: Comma-separated list of TypeScript file extensions; may require Atom restart to take effect; DO NOT EDIT unless you know what you are doing

jsFileExtensions.title: JavaScript file extensions
jsFileExtensions.description: Comma-separated list of JavaScript file extensions; may require Atom restart to take effect; DO NOT EDIT unless you know what you are doing

tsSyntaxScopes.title: TypeScript syntax scopes
tsSyntaxScopes.description: Comma-separated list of TypeScript syntax scopes; may require Atom restart to take effect; DO NOT EDIT unless you know what you are doing

jsSyntaxScopes.title: JavaScript syntax scopes
jsSyntaxScopes.description: Comma-separated list of JavaScript syntax scopes; may require Atom restart to take effect; DO NOT EDIT unless you know what you are doing

allowJS.title: Enable Atom-Typescript for JavaScript files (experimental)
allowJS.description: Passes JS files to TypeScript server; Most likely need allowJS: true and checkJS: true in tsconfig

tsserverInstancePerTsconfig.title: Spawn separate tsserver instance for each tsconfig.json
tsserverInstancePerTsconfig.description: This option helps avoid confusion when multiple projects are referincing the same file, but can prevent external definition files (d.ts) from reloading when changed. Changing this option requires Atom restart.

description: The only TypeScript plugin you will ever need.
name: atom-typescript

scripts.test: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run prettier-check
